name: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic : S1
summary:
2010年的10月10日，my little pony正式推出了G4“Friendship is Magic” ，比起前几代，这些小马造型更加可爱，更加Q,小马驹也在G4首次推出了羽翼独角兽，主要有7个人物，乡村小马Applejack，温柔的小飞马Fluttershy，活泼的普通小马Pinkie Pie，勇敢的小飞马Rainbow Dash，闪亮的独角兽rarity，魔法独角兽Twilight Sparkle，羽翼独角兽公主Celestia
　　每个小马都有自己的性格，她们互相帮助，团结友爱

eps.name: Friendship Is Magic, part 1 (Mare in the Moon)
eps.desc: After being warned of a horrible prophecy, Princess Celestia sends her overly studious student Twilight Sparkle to Ponyville to supervise the preparations for the Summer Sun Celebration and to "make some friends".

eps.name: Friendship Is Magic, part 2 (Elements of Harmony)
eps.desc: To stop Nightmare Moon, Twilight Sparkle, Spike and some locals must find the Elements of Harmony.

eps.name: The Ticket Master
eps.desc: Twilight must choose who to give one of her two tickets to the Grand Galloping Gala. Despite their attempts, her friends aren't helping her decide.

eps.name: Applebuck Season
eps.desc: Applejack stubbornly vows to perform the orchard harvest herself, despite driving herself to disruptive exhaustion.

eps.name: Griffon the Brush-Off
eps.desc: A griffon friend of Rainbow Dash comes to visit, but proves to be a cruel bully.

eps.name: Boast Busters
eps.desc: When a smug magician comes to town, Twilight Sparkle resists her friends' calls to challenge her for fear of seeming like a show-off herself.

eps.name: Dragonshy
eps.desc: Fluttershy must overcome her fears to stop a dragon from filling Ponyville with smoke.

eps.name: Look Before You Sleep
eps.desc: Prim Rarity and straightforward Applejack are forced to spend the night together at Twilight's.

eps.name: Bridle Gossip
eps.desc: When Twilight Sparkle and her friends come down with bizarre conditions, a mysterious zebra is blamed and pursued.

eps.name: Swarm of the Century
eps.desc: Just before a royal visit, Ponyville is infested with a cute but destructively ravenous and prolific swarm of insects.

eps.name: Winter Wrap Up
eps.desc: During Ponyville's annual outdoor spring cleanup, Twilight Sparkle struggles to find a way she can pitch in.

eps.name: Call of the Cutie
eps.desc: Applejack's little sister Apple Bloom is driven to get a "cutie mark" after most of her classmates receive one.

eps.name: Fall Weather Friends
eps.desc: Rainbow Dash and Applejack find themselves in an increasingly overheated athletic rivalry.

eps.name: Suited for Success
eps.desc: When Rarity's dressmaking instincts are overruled by her friends' esoteric specifications, the ridiculous results threaten to ruin her prospects with a famous fashion designer.

eps.name: Feeling Pinkie Keen
eps.desc: Twilight Sparkle is obsessively determined to discover the secret of Pinkie Pie's uncannily accurate intuitions.

eps.name: Sonic Rainboom
eps.desc: Rainbow Dash is preparing for the Best Young Flyer competition, so Twilight Sparkle casts a spell that gives Rarity temporary wings and the rest of them the ability to walk on clouds like Pegasi.

eps.name: Stare Master
eps.desc: Fluttershy's ill-considered offer to let the rambunctious Cutie Mark Crusaders sleep over at her house drives her to distraction and then danger.

eps.name: The Show Stoppers
eps.desc: The Cutie Mark Crusaders enter a talent contest, but their refusal to play their individual talents leads to a hilarious disaster.

eps.name: A Dog and Pony Show
eps.desc: When Rarity is kidnapped by Diamond Dogs, she makes them regret it even as her friends try to rescue her.

eps.name: Green Isn't Your Color
eps.desc: Rarity's use of a reluctant Fluttershy as her model to impress a fashion photographer backfires when the photographer only becomes interested in using her friend.

eps.name: Over a Barrel
eps.desc: Twilight Sparkle and her friends find themselves in the middle of a territorial conflict between a pony town and a bison tribe.

eps.name: A  Bird in the Hoof
eps.desc: Fluttershy takes it upon herself to treat Princess Celestia's ailing bird without permission.

eps.name: The Cutie Mark Chronicles
eps.desc: The Cutie Mark Crusaders ask Applejack, Fluttershy, Rarity, Twilight, Pinkie, and Rainbow Dash how they got their cutie marks.

eps.name: Qwl's Well That Ends Well
eps.desc: When an owl becomes Twilight Sparkle's nighttime assistant to ease Spike's workload, the insecure baby dragon becomes jealous.

eps.name: Party of One
eps.desc: Pinky Pie takes her friends' apparent avoidance of her personally to a manic degree.

eps.name: The Best Night Ever
eps.desc: Twilight Sparkle and her friends finally attend the Grand Galloping Gala, which disastrously doesn't live up to their expectations.
